name: Marsness
description:
Mother Earth has the only and last hope - Mars colonization. The high tech robots were sent into the expedition for preparing the red planet for human arrival. But something went wrong. It was caused by a solar radiation, or paint cans that were accidentally loaded into the rocket, who knows!!! The problem is - robots are gone nuts! There is only one serviceable robot left. And HE is not done yet!

Game made for Epic MegaJam 2020

Сontrol

WASD - move
E - Interact, take
G - Drop
Q - Tablet
LMB - Mop swing
R - send a signal to the Earth
